name: Metropolitan-Suite-Metropolitan-Suite
caption: Metropolitan Suite
alt:
The Metropolitan Suite features a Manhattan residential style with high ceilings. The beautiful foyer opens to an elegant living room comprised of two stylish sofas, coffee table, two side tables. A wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace, and two armor against the wall completes the room.

The bedroom features a plush king sized bed, two night stand with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock as also an executive writing desk and chair is located on the far side of the room.  A 40” TV on a console is across the bed next to a sofa.

The Turkish marble-clad bathroom is spacious and features a dressing area, double vanity sink, glass enclosed shower, soaking tub, oversized shower heads, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities. The Metropolitan Suite also features a half bathroom in the living room.
